title: Post removed for being in wrong section and i am confused someone please help.
body:
So i made this post in gameplay and it got removed and recommend it be placed in help and support? It looks like an automated message but this is my first time here and idk what i'm doing. It just seems off but i could be wrong idk. Where should i of posted this thread?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/R5KHt0g2-singed-current-state-and-what-it-will-be-like-after-the-tank-update?comment=00020000

replies.body: I looked up the thread and it doesn't appear to be removed.  Everything looks okay, but if you ever have any moderation questions you can hit them up in the [PB & Moderation](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) boards.  You've got a solid discussion going, keep it up!
